resources.string:
Made by Sancho
April-May 2019

Directory press = open directory
Directory longpress = add all tracks from directory to queue (recursively)
Track press = add to queue
Track longpress = add to queue and play
Playlist press = show playlist content
Playlist longpress = add playlist content to queue
Swipe from left = queue
Swipe from right = bookmarks
Swipe on queue/bookmark items = remove
Queue/bookmark items four line icon grab = reorder
Queue item press = play
Bookmark press = navigate to bookmark
Back = go to parent directory
